verses.verse: <S%H3467>Save<s%> <S%H430>me<s%>, O God, by your <S%H8034>name<s%>, and <S%H1777>judge<s%> me by your <S%H1369>strength<s%>.
<S%H8085>Hear<s%> my <S%H8605>prayer<s%>, O <S%H430>God<s%>; give <S%H238>ear<s%> to the <S%H561>words<s%> of my <S%H6310>mouth<s%>.

For <S%H2114>strangers<s%> are risen <S%H6965>up<s%> against <S%H6184>me<s%>, and oppressors <S%H1245>seek<s%> after my <S%H5315>soul<s%>: they have not <S%H7760>set<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> before <S%H5542>them<s%>. Selah.
<S%H430>Behold<s%>, God is my <S%H5826>helper<s%>: the <S%H136>Lord<s%> is with them that <S%H5564>uphold<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%>.
He shall <S%H7725>reward<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> unto my <S%H8324>enemies<s%>: cut them <S%H6789>off<s%> in your <S%H571>truth<s%>.
I will <S%H5071>freely<s%> <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> unto <S%H3034>you<s%>: I will praise your <S%H8034>name<s%>, O <S%H3068>Lord<s%>; for it is <S%H2896>good<s%>.
For he has <S%H5337>delivered<s%> me out of all <S%H6869>trouble<s%>: and my <S%H5869>eye<s%> has <S%H7200>seen<s%> his desire upon my <S%H341>enemies<s%>.
